James Mason, Alan Ladd, Patricia Medina. Dir., John Farrow

During the Eighteenth Century, a group of felons is shipped from Britain to Australia under the command of a sadistic sea captain. One of the prisoners--a wrongly convicted American--is determined to escape.

Someone upped this DVDR to usenet a while back: all credit to him or her. The source appears to be VHS, and image quality is pretty good. (See the sample screen cap referred to above.) Botany Bay has never been released on DVD.  

Soundtrack is in English, with no subtitles. 

Size is 2.82 GB. 

Format is NTSC.
